documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
that the
program simulates the neuron firings at the synapses by having beer cans
bang into each other, thus achieving a strict correspondence between neu-
ron firings and beer-can bangings. And at the end of the sequence a beer
can pops up on which is written “I am thirsty.” Now, to repeat the question,
does anyone suppose that this Rube Goldberg apparatus is literally thirsty
in the sense in which you and I are?
Notice that the thesis of [strong AI] is not that for all we knowthe collec-
tion
